include » sys

syscall.h File Reference

Detailed Description

The System call numbers for the system are defined here. These numbers are then used to index into the system call vector table by the system call handler, when a system call is invoked.

The system calls are available for following routines

  • Process Management
  • Thread Managament
  • Semaphore
  • Message Queue
  • Shared Memory
  • Dynamic Buffer Management
  • XilNet
